channel.title: How do i make npcs teleport the player when they die?
channel.description:
as the topic says
how do i make npcs teleport the player when they die?

item.title: How do i make npcs teleport the player when they die?
item.dc:creator: @Macko11 Macko11
item.description:
@Macko11 wrote:

go into your npchandler.java and search for System.out.println("Npc id =" + NPCID);
and you should see this

System.out.println("Npc id =" + NPCID); if (npcs[NPCID] != null && server.playerHandler.players[Play] != null && server.playerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(NPCID)] != null) {
under this add this code

[code] if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == NPCID) {
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

          ppl.teleportToX = XCOORDS;
          ppl.teleportToY = YCOORDS;
          } [/code]

notice the ppl.teleport part that might be a different variable in your source if it is pm me and ill help you â€¦ atfer you have done all of the above save compile and run if you have done everything correctly you shouldnt have any errors. Hope This Helped

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npcs teleport the player when they die?
